attributes.action: Make extra training available for 16 year olds to prove they are capable of riding a 125cc motorbike on the road.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For a 16 year old, 50cc mopeds/motorcycles may be useful, but traveling at 30mph on a bypass is dangerous. Drivers intimidate the riders which can cause injuries. I would like 16 year olds to be able to ride a 125cc bike if they can prove they're capable.
